snippet: The People’s Climate March will run through Midtown Manhattan on Sunday, and organizers hope to attract thousands of participants from across the world to New York City for the event.
abstract: Organizers of People's Climate March, which will run through Midtown Manhattan on Sept 21, hope to draw thousands of participants from around world to protest climate change; run-up has transformed New York City into busy hub of planning and creativity, with artists and activists from near and far pitching in to help prepare.
lead_paragraph: The People’s Climate March will run through Midtown Manhattan on Sunday, and organizers hope to attract thousands of participants from across the world to New York City for the event.

headline.main: Busy Days Precede a March Focusing on Climate Change
headline.print_headline: Busy Days Precede Protest on Climate
